post.description:
#### Permissions

- upload

parameters.description: If specify "1", the API always overwrites an existing file with the uploaded file. This parameter has been available since Movable Type 6.1.2
parameters.name: overwrite_once

autoRenameIfExists.description: If this value is "1" and a file with the same filename exists, the uploaded file is automatically renamed to a random generated name. Default is "0".

autoRenameNonAscii.description: If this value is "1", the filename is renamed non-ascii filename automatically

normalizeOrientation.description: If this value is "1" and the uploaded file has orientation information in Exif data, this file's orientation is automatically normalized. Default is "1".

path.description: The upload destination. You can specify the path to the under the site path.

403.description: Do not have permission to upload.

413.description: Upload file size is larger than CGIMaxUpload.

delete.description:
Invalidate current session. This is like logout. All access tokens related to that session are invalidated too.

Authorization is required. but if there is an effective session, user can revoke by the following methods.

In the case of a web browser, can be authorized by httponly-cookie.

In the case of other than a browser, can be authorized by sending a sessionId that is retrieved via authentication endpoints in MTAuth request header.

`MTAuth sessionId={retrieved sessionId}`

#### Notes
- This method accepts DELETE and POST with __method=DELETE.

parameters.description: Input `MTAuth sessionId={sessionId}`
parameters.name: X-MT-Authorization

clientId.description: This is not required if you specify session id via "X-MT-Authorization" request header. You can create new access token if you have a session id related to this clientId, although you do not have an access token.

status.description: The value of this parameter is always "success".

405.description: Request method is not DELETE or POST with __method=DELETE

delete.summary: Invalidate current access token. This is not logout

post.description: Create a new session and access token. This is like sign-in.

clientId.description: This is not required if you specify session id via "X-MT-Authorization" request header. You can create new access token if you have a session id related to this clientId, although you do not have an access token.

mtDataApiLoginMagicToken.description: This is not required if you authenticate except via browser. If this parameter is passed and valid the MT will set cookie in order to start a session.

remember.description: If true (generally, "1" is specified.), a new session will be created as a persistent session. If you want to specify false, you can pass "" or "0" to this parameter.

expiresIn.description: This access token will be invalidated automatically after the number of seconds specified here.

remember.description: If true, a new session has been created as a persistent session.

sessionId.description: Session ID. This value is included only when mtDataApiLoginMagicToken is not passed. If mtDataApiLoginMagicToken is passed (and is valid value), sessionId is stored in httponly-cookie.

The status text of this rebuild.

#### Rebuilding

Not yet completed.
User should start next phase that implies by X-MT-Next-Phase-URL response header.
(In JavaScript library, a next phase is started automatically.)

#### Complete

All the static archives were rebuilded.

X-MT-Next-Phase-URL.description: If status is "Rebuilding", user should start next phase that implies by this header, manually.(In JavaScript library, a next phase is started automatically.)

delete.description:
Invalidate current access token. This is not logout. If the browser has active session id, new access token can be obtained easily.

Authorization is required.

#### Notes
- This method accepts DELETE and POST with __method=DELETE.

status.description: The value of this parameter is always "success".

405.description: Request method is not DELETE or POST with __method=DELETE

delete.summary: Invalidate current session. This is like logout

post.description:
Create new access token related to current session.

In order to create new access token, in the case of a web browser, it is necessary to create session via authentication endpoints beforehand.

In the case of other than a browser, it is necessary to send a sessionId that is retrieved via authentication endpoints in MTAuth request header.

`MTAuth sessionId={retrieved sessionId}`

parameters.description: Input `MTAuth sessionId={sessionId}`
parameters.name: X-MT-Authorization

clientId.description: This is not required if you specify session id via "X-MT-Authorization" request header. You can create new access token if you have a session id related to this clientId, although you do not have an access token.

expiresIn.description: This access token will be invalidated automatically after the number of seconds specified here.

post.summary: Create new access token related to current session

get.description:
- Authentication is required to include non-active users or to get private properties.

#### Permissions

- administer
  - to retrieve non-active users
  - to read private properties

parameters.description: Input `MTAuth accessToken={accessToken}`
parameters.name: X-MT-Authorization

parameters.description:
The field name for sort. You can specify one of following values
- id
- name

**Default**: name
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description:
Filter by users's status.

#### active

status is Active

#### disabled

status is Disabled.

#### pending

status is Pending
parameters.name: status

parameters.description:
Filter by user's lockout status.

#### locked_out

Locked out user only

#### not_locked_out

Not locked out user only
parameters.name: lockout

403.description: Do not have permission to retrieve the requested users.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of users in the specified site

post.description:
- Authentication is required.

#### Permissions

- administer

403.description: Do not have permission to create a user.
Do not have permission to export users.

get.summary: Export users

403.description: Do not have permission to import users.
Do not have permission to synchronize users.

delete.description:
- Authentication is required.
- Cannot delete oneself. Also, cannot delete system administrator user.

#### Permissions

- administer

#### Notes
- This method accepts DELETE and POST with __method=DELETE.

403.description: Do not have permission to delete a user.

405.description: Request method is not DELETE or POST with __method=DELETE

get.description:
Retrieve a single user by its ID.

Authorization is required if you want to retrieve private properties.

parameters.description: Input `MTAuth accessToken={accessToken}`
parameters.name: X-MT-Authorization

parameters.description: This is an optional parameter. The field list to retrieve as part of the Users resource. This list should be separated by comma. If this parameter is not specified, All fields will be returned.
parameters.name: fields

403.description: Do not have permission to retrieve the requested user.

get.summary: Retrieve a single user by its ID

put.description:
Update user data.

Authorization is required.

#### Notes
- This method accepts PUT and POST with __method=PUT.

403.description: Do not have permission to update the requested user.

405.description: Request method is not PUT or POST with __method=PUT

403.description: Do not have permission to retrieve the requested user's groups.

get.description: Retrieve a list of blogs by user.

parameters.description: Input `MTAuth accessToken={accessToken}`
parameters.name: X-MT-Authorization

parameters.description: This is an optional parameter. Maximum number of blogs to retrieve. Default is 25.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: This is an optional parameter. 0-indexed offset. Default is 0.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description:
This is an optional parameter.

#### name

(default) Sort by the name of each blogs.

#### created_on

Sort by the created time of each blogs.
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description:
This is an optional parameter.

#### ascend

(default) Return blogs in ascending order. For the date, it means from oldest to newset.

#### descend

Return blogs in descending order. For the date, it means from newest to oldest.
parameters.name: sortOrder

parameters.description: This is an optional parameter. The comma separated ID list of blogs to include to result.
parameters.name: includeIds

parameters.description: This is an optional parameter. The comma separated ID list of blogs to exclude from result.
parameters.name: excludeIds

parameters.description: This is an optional parameter. the field list to retrieve as part of the Blogs resource. That list should be separated by comma. If this parameter is not specified, All fields will be returned.
parameters.name: fields

items.description: An array of Blogs resource. The list will sorted descending by blog name.

totalResults.description: The total number of blogs found.

403.description: Do not have permission to retrieve the list of blogs.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of blogs by user

post.description:
- Authentication is required.

#### Permissions

- administer

403.description: Do not have permission to unlock a user.

get.description:
Retrieves Data API version of the server.

**This endpoint has been available since Movable Type 6.2.4.**

This endpoint does not need /v3 or something API endpoint version identifier.
You can call like: `https://host/path/your-mt-data-api.cgi/version`
get.summary: Get server API version
